verses.verse: A song of ascents. Out of the depths[b] I cry to you, O LORD;
O Lord, hear my voice. Let your ears be attentive to my cries of supplication.[c]
If you, O LORD, kept a record of our sins, O Lord, who could stand[d] upright?
But with you there is forgiveness so that you may be revered.[e]
I wait for the LORD[f] in anxious expectation; I place my hope in his word.
My soul waits for the Lord more than watchmen wait for the dawn. More than watchmen wait for the dawn[g]
[h]let Israel wait for the LORD. For with the LORD there is kindness, as well as plenteous redemption.
He alone will redeem Israel from all its sins.
